attributes.action: give elderly citizens the same level of protection from abuse accorded to children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Panorama programme shown on 12.02.07 revealed evidence of the continuing scandal of the current level of care of elderly citizens in Britain.  The Government should give a lead in rectifying this dreadful state of affairs, by enacting legal protection comparable to that available to children, and ensuring effective oversight of care home standards. Citizens should be entitled to expect proper and dignified care when they reach the end of their lives.
